contextId.information: Paul is emphasizing that the gift of prophecy is greater than the gift of speaking in tongues. AT: "The one who prophesies has a greater gift" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
contextId.quote: The one who prophesies is greater

contextId.information: "I do not understand the words I am saying" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
